item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 24.1 We are honored to announce the January release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release, we fixed a bug with the conversion of PDF from HTML.
